content: Search Free Trial Get Demo Day August 6, 2024 The 8-Day Rule A Game Changer in Spam Detection August 6, 2024 In the world of digital marketing and email communication spam is always a problem. A recent case study showed us the importance of longer rule expiration values in spam detection systems. Lets see how changing from 2 to 8 days made a big difference.
